Name: Axe
Obtained: Gift: Kaeli (after defeating Minotaur in Level Forest)

Name: Charm Claw
Notes: Magic +5. Can inflict Poison; Paralyze; Sleep; Confuse; Blind.

Name: Dragon Claw
Notes: Magic +5. Can inflict Poison; Paralyze; Sleep; Confuse; Blind; Petrify; Silence.

Name: Ninja Star
Notes: Shoot-elemental. Speed +5. Can inflict Poison; Paralyze.

Name: Bow of Grace (Arrow)
Obtained: Initial: Phoebe (after giving Benjamin Cat Claw)

Name: Bare Hands
Obtained: Used when a character runs out of Ammo for their weapon.
Notes: Only available to Benjamin; Tristam; Phoebe.
